name: Angel Eyes
about: A cover of the song, Angel Eyes.
lyrics:
There's no one above it.
We all need some loving;
Some kissing and hugging
Like yeah! Yeah-yeah-yeah!

You cannot live without it,
Yes. I used to doubt it,
But now that I have found it:
Yeah! Yeah-yeah-yeah;

Because my baby's got
Oooh! Angel eyes.
Yeah! My baby's got
Oooh! Angel eyes. 

Till now, I have been there down and lonely. 
I wish if only 
The whole world could feel my vibe. 
We all need one simple reason: 
Something to believe in. 
I know that I have got mine; 

Because my baby's got
Oooh! Angel eyes.
Yeah! My baby's got
Oooh! Angel eyes.
